title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: When performing the 'copy package' operation in the jdt.ui3 plugin, a strange behavior occurs. After selecting xxx as the destination, the package 'ui' appears in the xx project.
OB: The xx project contains a package 'ui' after performing the 'copy package' operation.
EB: The xx project should not contain a package 'ui' after performing the 'copy package' operation.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the jdt.ui3 plugin
2. Select the 'copy package' operation
3. Choose xxx as the destination
4. Verify that the xx project does not contain a package 'ui'
